ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Verant and Star Wars OT (was Official confirmation  from Ester)
ygData.msgSnippet: ya.. treat space like one big boat ride (aka treat planets like a continent). But i do beleive they might want to do something in space or players will be
ygData.messageBody:
ya.. treat space like one big boat ride (aka treat planets like a
continent). But i do beleive they might want to do something in space or
players will be dissapointed

but on a gaming scale, this could mean that for instance, look at eq, 5
continents (once vellious comes out) that's like 5 planets in SWO. Assuming
that there's more then 1 zone per planet *shrug*

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: September 8, 2000 4:26 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Verant and Star Wars OT (was Official
confirmation from Ester)



Maybe each planet could be a virtual world and the starships would fly you
from one to the other. If too many people are playing on Coruscant you
would always have the option of just hitching a ship to a different world,
no more calls for split servers.
------------------------------_->

i honestly dont know how they're gonna pull off the SWO but knowing that
lucasarts is involved, verant is gonna get a ton of heat reguarding quality
of product and SERVICE... Lucasarts is a very very rich organization who
wont let a small company tarnish their name with bad service... they have
the budget, they'll use it.

As to how they're gonna pull off all the land/space gameplay, you've got me
stumped as to how they're gonna do it

Rakka/Minkin
Sol Ro

with the subject submissions.
